summary: A photographer on an expedition in the jungle runs afoul of a voodoo cult.
cast: Paul Burke|Allison Hayes|John Wengraf|Eugenia Paul|Joel Marston|Robert Christopher|Dean Fredericks|A.E. Ukonu|Paul Thompson|Otis Greene|George Chester|Daniel Elam|Wesley Gale|Maxie Thrower
title: The Disembodied
